body: Alright, so I basically have this web browser virus thingy called "Hades", I can't seem to uninstall it, there are more viruses but that's the main one, help me please!
body_tagged: Alright, so I basically have this web browser virus thingy called "Hades", I can't seem to uninstall it, there are more viruses but that's the main one, help me please!
title: Help (Urgent)

replies.body:
Avicus forums aren't really savvy with this, I'd go over to reddit or some place that's more experienced with this stuff. I did a basic search and only found a youtube video that had 3 dislikes and a few views.

And try to post more details (browser, if you have extensions, etc.)

replies.body_tagged:
http://malwaretips.com/blogs/ads-by-hades-removal/

replies.body:
1. Control Panel -> Uninstall a Program -> search "Hades" and look for any suspicious file names downloaded that you are not aware of.
2. Open Web Browser:
(Chrome): Options -> Settings -> Extensions
(Internet Explorer): Options -> Manage Add-ons, Search engines, etc.
3. Libraries -> This PC -> Program Files/ x86 Program Files -> Search for any folders like "Hades"
There's a few easy ways
